'''''Geronimo!''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Challenger: Series II]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to hit an opponent with a Plunging Attack after plunging for more than 5 seconds.

==Trivia==
* "Geronimo" is an American expression used by jumping skydivers or anyone jumping from a great height.<ref>{{w|Geronimo_(exclamation)|Wikipedia - Geronimo (exclamation)}}</ref> It was originally a battle cry used by paratroopers jumping from a plane during the Second World War.<ref>Dictionary.com: [https://www.dictionary.com/browse/geronimo Geronimo]</ref>
* The Chinese and Korean names instead reference the ''[[w:c:overwatch:Overwatch|Overwatch]]'' character [[w:c:overwatch:Pharah|Pharah]]'s quote upon using her ultimate ability, Barrage: "Justice rains from above!"
